description: Try our easy to follow Sausage Casserole With Cheese Dumplings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sausage Casserole With Cheese Dumplings Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 kg cracked black pepper & wagyu beef sausages

recipeInstructions.text: Form rough tablespoons of dough into balls and place on top of casserole. Cover with lid and bake for 10 minutes. Remove lid and bake for a further 25 minutes or until the dumplings are golden and crusty. Stand for 5 minutes before serving.
